@MiamiSubtweets I had severe chronic treatment resistant depression my whole life including self harming and suicide attempts. I've done PHPs multiple times, all the meds, years of therapy. still depressed. TMS saved my life and thats not an exaggeration at all. best treatment I've ever done.

@MiamiSubtweets it can last even longer than a year [for about 50% of patients] and can help with anxiety and insomnia as well! it also has almost no side effects. and the best part is unlike with meds, the more you do it the more likely remission is statistically! u can DM me if u want to chat
